ref: 5236 *jīrayati ʻ digests ʼ. &rcirclemacr Pa. jīrēti, jīrāpēti ʻ works out (e.g. wages), digests ʼ; B. jirāna ʻ to rest, repose ʼ; Or. jireibā ʻ to rest after a meal ʼ; G. jiravvũ ʻ to digest ʼ; -- A. zirni ʻ rest ʼ, B. jiren.

lang: or mald. Maldivian dialect of Sinhalese
ref: Md. direnī ʻ is digested ʼ, diruvanī ʻ digests ʼ.
